name: BattleMon!
description:
This is a turn-based game i started making last year and i didn't finish it.

Even now, i didn't finish it, but i did upload it here to make sure im not losing it, and also, i did add a save feature!

Basically, when you start the game, you can create a new character (or load a already existing one), you can then start a monster battle, attack it and gain XP! There is only 4 monsters added, but over 50 monsters was planned (+ bosses). If you die, your character is "destroyed".

I could do something with this, but if i don't get any demands, i won't!
